title: abhayam aLittennai ANDaruL
sahitya:
abhayam aLittennai ANDaruL ANDavA ammaiyappA sharaNam


anupallavi

  japa tapa dhyAna samAdiyilE layitta jIvan muzhudum aruT-kAviyam AghiDa


caraNam    vanjak-koDiyavarin nanjap-porAmaiyAl en mati kalangA urudi taruvAi
venjinap-paghaivarin vEga erimalaiyin nenjai shuDAda nilai aruLAi
anjavarum arakkar minjum vashaigaLAl en amaidi keDA manam taruvAi
tanjam aDaindEn unnait-tAyiDanm sEyena tAngik-kavalai tuyar nIngat-tuNai purivAi
